body:
Try to record a macro to do what you want to do and check out the link below, for some suggestions on how to find the last used row.

https://www.thespreadsheetguru.com/blog/2014/7/7/5-different-ways-to-find-the-last-row-or-last-column-using-vba
title: Copy a range of values and paste them concatenated by commas
